title: Rename tag and edit text
useCase: One user changes element's name while the other edits its content.
outcome: Alice’s commit is successful, Bob’s commit is refused and he is asked to manually solve the conflict
scenarios: Alice checkouts repository; Bob checkouts repository; Alice edits file -  renames tag/element's name; Bob edits the same file - changes text within the same element; Alice commits changes; Bob commits changes;
